title: Property Listing
description: Schema representing a comprehensive property listing object with all property information and metadata.

id.description: Globally unique identifier (UUID) for the listing record in the system.

code.description: Human-readable internal code identifying the listing within the platform.

price.description: Current asking price in currency units for the entire property.

floor.description: Numeric floor level of the unit within the building.

propertyArea.description: Total interior built area of the unit measured in square meters.

description.description: Free-text listing description written by agents or system editors.

type.description: Specific property subtype, e.g., Apartment, Maisonette, Studio, or Land.

viewCount.description: Cumulative count of listing views recorded by the platform.

title.description: Public listing title combining area, size, and location details.

isSold.description: Whether the property has been sold and is no longer available.

isPromoted.description: Promotion flag indicating enhanced visibility due to paid or internal boosting.

isFavorite.description: User-level flag indicating listing is saved to favorites by a viewer.

isHot.description: Internal marketing flag marking listing as hot or trending.

isSponsored.description: Flag indicating sponsored placement or paid advertising status.

isExclusive.description: Whether the listing is under exclusive representation agreement.

defaultImagePath.description: URL of the primary image used in listing cards or detail pages.

lastModified.description: Timestamp when listing data was last updated in the system.

createdOn.description: Timestamp when the listing record was first created.

numberOfFloors.description: Number of floors in the building or structure containing the unit.

numberOfRooms.description: Total number of rooms defined for the property listing.

numberOfBathrooms.description: Count of bathrooms excluding separate WC rooms.

numberOfWC.description: Count of separate WC rooms distinct from full bathrooms.

masterRoom.description: Number of master bedrooms typically featuring en-suite bathroom facilities.

constructionYear.description: Year the building or main structure was originally constructed.

renovationYear.description: Calendar year of most recent renovation or substantial refurbishment.

publishedStatus.description: Publication workflow status, e.g., processing, published, or archived.

tags.description: List of labels for categorization, marketing, or filtering purposes.

amenities.description: Grouped boolean flags indicating specific property features and conveniences available to occupants.

hasElevator.description: Whether the building includes an elevator providing vertical access between floors.

hasAlarm.description: Whether a security alarm system is installed or supported on the property.

hasSafetyDoor.description: Whether the main door is reinforced or certified as a safety/security door.

accessibilityForDisabled.description: Whether access and facilities are suitable for people with mobility impairments.

hasGarden.description: Whether the property includes a private or shared garden or green area.

hasPool.description: Whether a swimming pool is present within the property or common areas.

internalStaircase.description: Whether the unit has an internal staircase connecting its private levels.

hasBoiler.description: Presence of a central or autonomous boiler for water or space heating.

hasNightElectricCurrent.description: Availability of reduced night-rate electric meter or corresponding supply capability.

hasPlayroom.description: Whether a dedicated playroom or recreation room exists within the property.

hasSolarWaterHeating.description: Presence of solar thermal water heater or roof-mounted solar boiler installation.

hasStorageRoom.description: Whether a dedicated storage room, often in basement or auxiliary area.

hasTents.description: Whether retractable awnings or shading tents are installed on balconies or terraces.

isAiry.description: Indicates cross-ventilation or multiple aspects that enable better airflow inside.

isBright.description: Indicates good natural light due to exposure, windows, or orientation.

isFloorApartment.description: Whether the unit occupies an entire floor without neighboring same-level units.

isPenthouse.description: Whether the unit is a top-floor penthouse, often with exclusive terrace access.

petsAreAllowed.description: Whether pets are permitted according to building rules or owner preference.

sieves.description: Internal flag from source system; denotes specific feature, likely shading or screening elements.

suitableForProfessionalUse.description: Whether zoning or layout makes the property suitable for professional use.

suitableForTouristUse.description: Whether layout and regulations allow use for short-term or tourist rentals.

address.description: Container for geographical address attributes and geocoding data.

country.description: Country component of the address for the property location.

prefecture.description: Prefecture, municipality, or locality as stored in the source system.

postalCode.description: Postal or ZIP code associated with the property address.

geoPoint.description: Latitude and longitude pair encoded as a comma-separated string.

administrativeAreas.description: Administrative areas field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

defaultPhoto.description: Container for the default media object and its metadata fields.

mediaGuid.description: Unique identifier for the media asset within the media store.

isDefault.description: Whether this media item is the designated default photo for display.

uri.description: Primary URL pointing to the media resource used by clients.

fallbackUri.description: Backup URL served when the primary media resource is unavailable.

altText.description: Alternative text describing the media for accessibility and SEO.

order.description: Display order index used for sorting media within galleries.

type.description: Specific property subtype, e.g., Apartment, Maisonette, Studio, or Land.

photoItems.description: Photo items field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

basementSize.description: Basement area in square meters allocated to the unit or property.

ownershipPercentage.description: Percentage of ownership share held relative to the entire property.

ownershipType.description: Ownership form, e.g., full, usufruct, bare ownership, or similar.

propertyUsageCategory.description: High-level usage type, e.g., Residential, Commercial, Land, or Industrial.

residentialZone.description: Indicates if the property lies within a designated residential zoning area.

parkingSpace.description: Count of parking spaces included or allocated to the property.

parkingType.description: List of parking types provided, e.g., open, closed, shared, or underground.

storageArea.description: Auxiliary storage area size in square meters, if defined.

storageType.description: List describing storage provisions, e.g., attic, basement, built-in closets.

plotArea.description: Total land plot size in square meters associated with the listing.

coveredVeranda.description: Covered veranda field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

frames.description: Window or door frame material, e.g., aluminum, PVC, or wooden.

constructionMaterial.description: List of construction materials used, as structured or free-form values.

floorMaterial.description: List of flooring materials present, e.g., tile, wooden, marble.

energyClass.description: Energy performance class according to local certification scheme.

heatingControl.description: Heating control scheme, e.g., central building control or autonomous unit control.

heatingType.description: Primary heating source or system type, e.g., gas, oil, heat pump.

previousPrice.description: Most recent previous asking price before the latest change.

preApprovalAmmount.description: Pre approval amount field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

preApproved.description: Pre approved field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

kaek.description: Greek land registry identifier (KAEK) for parcels or units.

externalCode.description: External code field captured from listing data; purpose varies by context and usage.

neighborhood.description: Narrative neighborhood context or description provided by editors.

availability.description: Current availability status, e.g., vacant, rented, or unknown.

auctionDateTime.description: Auction start date and time in ISO 8601 format where applicable.

auctionRound.description: Numeric auction round index when multiple rounds are scheduled.
